properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A beautifully presented two bedroom detached bungalow located in a quiet cul-de-sac in the popular St. Mary Cray area. This property features a spacious living room, modern kitchen, and a well-maintained garden. The bungalow is close to local amenities, schools, and transport links.
properties.location: Maple Drive, St. Mary Cray, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Modern one-bedroom apartment located in the heart of Orpington. This apartment offers an open-plan living area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with stunning views. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors, it is close to shops, restaurants, and public transport.

Spacious four-bedroom townhouse located in a desirable neighborhood. This property features a large living room, modern kitchen with dining area, and a private garden. The townhouse is close to excellent schools, parks, and transport links to London.

Charming two-bedroom cottage located in a peaceful village setting. This property boasts a cozy living room with a fireplace, a country-style kitchen, and a beautiful garden. Perfect for those seeking a tranquil lifestyle while still being within reach of Orpington's amenities.
properties.location: Willow Lane, Village Near Orpington BR6

properties.description: Stylish three-bedroom duplex apartment located in a modern development. This property features an open-plan living area, a contemporary kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The duplex is conveniently located near shopping centers, restaurants, and public transport.
